title: Escalation to BUGME
summary: BugMe escalation guide and required case documentation fields.
process: Put a Case Macro documenting the request
Ask approval to the following (TL, SME, HD)
note: Offshore ONLY - Escalation to BugMe approved by: Your TL should test the issue on desktop and/or mobile devices (according to issue) and confirm if it needs to be escalated. If they find a solution upon testing, they can provide proper steps to follow. Please do not include a Jira Ticket in this section.

fields.label: Current Behavior (Description)
fields.description: This field is to best describe the issue occurring with the bug. Itâ€™s important to provide as much detail as you can, especially if the previous interaction was a call, seeing as we can only rely on your notes. If this field is not clear - we will not be able to report the issue.

fields.label: Expected Behavior
fields.description: To clarify how the app/site SHOULD work if the bug were not an issue.

fields.label: Steps to Reproduce
fields.description: If TL was able to use mobile devices, please write steps they took to reproduce. OR outline (if possible) what steps the member/user took in order to get the bug.

fields.label: Additional Information
fields.description: This field should provide Device, Platform (mobile app, mobile web, browser, etc.), app version.

finalSteps: Provide reason 'process sits with other department'
